title: RITO!

replies.body:
How the hell am I supposed to facilitate the Glorious Evolution if Viktor is disabled?! You know, I have one simple request, and that is to have a societal revolution of mechanized magnanimity in conjunction with wicked-cool prosthetics _that fire laser beams!_ Now, our generous benefactors at Riot Games have informed me that is not currently feasible.

How much longer must I wait before the way can be paved for a glorious future?!
This is a very tRumbling issue

Does anyone actually know what the bug is?

I tried Viktor this week and I noticed the range indicator for his E popped up when I held down the E key even though I was using quickcast. The last time I played Viktor this range indicator never appeared.
It typically shows a range indicator.
I love Rumble and cant use em he has been disabled for my whole weekend and now i amsad because i can not have any fun with any other champ besides gnar top because i alternate rymble and gnar Top

Meanwhile I am celebrating

Cuz for some reason, I cannot beat Rumble. No idea why, he just counters me as a player.
omg xd c9 xdddddddxdxdxddddddd c9 pls tell meteor i love him
For 1 it is meteos, and what does this have to do with anything?
